source_dsc: USGS NWIS API access through either R or python using dataretrevial package. See https://waterdata.usgs.gov/blog/dataretrieval/ for more information.
Reclamation Hydrologic Database accessed through web request or query tool see https://www.usbr.gov/lc/region/g4000/riverops/_HdbWebQuery.html.
Colorado Basin River Forecast Center web service provides forecast and observed data for the Colorado River Basin.
